# dispgpgpub
Displays the RSA modulus and exponent from a GnuPG RSA public key file.

This is a modified version of https://github.com/dkg/monkeysphere/blob/master/src/share/keytrans that simply reads a GnuPG RSA public key file and outputs its RSA modulus and public exponent to stdout. 
## Usage
`dispgpgpub.pl pubkey.gpg`

## Example
```
./dispgpgpub.pl pub.gpg 
Modulus:  
Exponent: 010001
```
